summary: Two missionaries (Bud Spencer and Terence Hill) come into conflict with the authorities when they turn their missionary into a parrot farm. The Bishop of Maracaibo calls them his 'black ... See full summary Â»
cast: Terence Hill|Bud Spencer|Jean-Pierre Aumont|Robert Loggia|Mario Pilar|Salvatore Basile|Maria Cumani Quasimodo|Jacques Herlin|Mario Erpichini|Antonio Mendoza|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Lorenzo Piani|Giancarlo Bastianoni|Riccardo Pizzuti|Marcello Verziera
title: Dos misioneros
